item.description: Boston Millionaires meet up to enjoy another night of great Karaoke at the Maddy's Entertainment Complex in Saugus, Ma. Free Buffet starts a 6pm and music starts at 7pm. This is a night not to miss, special Celebrity guests drop by and it makes for a ton of fun. Travels with Terri Lee, Boston Millionaires Clint, Rpbert Leger and the lovely Miss Heather Rose will be there for more good times. Join us and we hope to see you soon at the new Maddy's Bar and Grill Complex.
item.name: 01-09-11 Boston Millionaires meet up at Maddy's for Karaoke & free buffett
